Translations.Text: And even though We had mercy on them and removed the difficulty that is on them, still they would stubbornly continue to exceed their limits, wandering here and there being diverted
And indeed, We seized them with Punishment, still they did not humble themselves to their Lord, and they do not humbly receive (Him)
Till We open on them a gate of a harsh Punishment: Then listen! They will be drowned in pain (and sorrow) in there
It is He Who has made for you (the faculties of) hearing, sight, feeling and understanding: (Yet) it is that you give little thanks
And He has spread you throughout the earth, and you will be gathered back to Him
And it is He Who gives life and causes death, and to Him (is due) the exchange (alternation) of night and day: Then will you not understand
To the opposite (effect), they say things similar to what the olden (people) said
They said: "What! When we die and become dust and bones, can we really be raised up again
Verily, such things have been promised to us and our fathers before! This is nothing but the stories of the ancient
Say: "To whom belong the earth and all beings in there? (Answer) if you know
They will say: "To Allah!" Say: "Yet will you not take warning (and guidance)
Say: "Who is the Lord of the seven heavens, and the Lord of the Throne Supreme (Rab-ul-Arsh-ul-Azeem)
They will say: "(They belong) to Allah." Say: "Then will you not be filled with fear (and respect)
Say: "Who is it in whose hands is the sovereignty (and order) of all thingsâ€” Who protects (all), but is not protected: (Answer) if you know
They will say: "(It belongs) to Allah." Say: "How, then are you deceived away from truth
